p: EEPS was observed to have a potent inhibitory activity on α-amylase compared to WEPS. As shown in Figure 2(b), the inhibitory activity increased with increasing EEPS concentrations, although a lower activity was obtained than acarbose (IC 50 values of 201.31 ± 2.43 and 152.46 ± 8.43 μg/mL, respectively). However, it was observed that WEPS had no inhibitory activity on α-amylase.
